sentences.sContent: You have the right to retain possession of the goods.
The state wants to retain control of food imports.
sentences.sCn: 政府想保留对食品进口的控制权。

remMethod.val: 在雨中(rain)还保持(retain)原来的姿势

words.tran: 保持器；家臣；保持者；[机] 护圈；预付费用

trans.tranOther: to keep something or continue to have something
